about_the_game:
About This Game

Red-Shift Point is a unique first-person survival shooter set in the year 2037, a future world thrown into chaos by runaway AI technology, corporate domination, and resource depletion. Players can choose to play as soldiers or scavengers, exploring the New Star Anomaly Zone and using modern tactical skills to combat mechanical lifeforms and hostile forces.

Key Features:

Unique Art Style and Deep Game Experience: Breaks tradition with a visually striking and thought-provoking world.
Minimalist Design: Simplified interface and controls allow players to focus on the game itself.
Rich Equipment System: A diverse array of weapons and equipment for players to choose from and upgrade, offering a high degree of tactical freedom.
In-depth Story Exploration: Players uncover the narrative and secrets within a vast world spanning 600 years.
Immersive Survival Shooting: Emphasizes the first-person perspective for a deeply immersive experience, realistically simulating survival challenges within a robotic ecosystem.
Hardcore Tactical Shooting: Realistic combat simulation and a variety of weapon customization options make every battle strategic.
Resource Management and Base Building: Players need to manage resources, build bases, and devise strategies outside the game, influencing the overall direction of the game world.
Dynamic World Operation System: Players can affect the development and storyline of the game world through macro-level decisions.
In Red-Shift Point, players will engage in combat and resource gathering in various environments, making timely decisions to evacuate when necessary. The ultimate goal goes beyond in-game victory or successful evacuations; through the macro decision-making system, players can influence the overall development and narrative of the game world.

Join our crowdfunding campaign, and we promise to fill the game with immersive survival actions, tactical movements, and combat systems within our production capabilities, offering a brand new immersive gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description

Red-Shift Point is a first-person survival shooter game that blends modern Chinese culture with a futuristic style. To ensure players are fully aware of the mature content within the game, here is a detailed description of the violence, language, drug use, and other elements present in the game.

Violence Content

Realistic Violence: The game includes scenes of blood, violent actions, accidental deaths, and bodily harm. Players will engage in intense combat scenarios against mechanical lifeforms and hostile forces, with blood and violence depicted during these encounters.
Horror Elements: Some game scenes are dark and create a tense atmosphere, though there are no extremely frightening scenes or psychological horror.
Language Content

Mild Inappropriate Content: The game includes mild inappropriate language and occasional moderate vulgar language.
Drugs and Alcohol

Legal Drugs: There are implied scenes of drinking alcohol or smoking.
Criminal Behavior

Depiction of Crime: The game’s storyline includes depictions of criminal behavior such as theft or violence, but it does not glorify or endorse such actions.
Interactive Elements

Online Interaction: Players can interact with each other through the in-game chat system.
In-Game Purchases: The game offers chance-based in-game purchases where players can buy virtual items and equipment.
Other Sensitive Topics

No Sexual Assault/Non-Consensual Acts: The game does not include any form of sexual assault or non-consensual acts.
No Illegal Drug Abuse: The game does not depict any illegal drug abuse or related content.
No Self-Harm: The game does not portray any self-harm behaviors.
Red-Shift Point includes various mature content, such as realistic violence, mild inappropriate language, legal drug use, and depictions of criminal behavior. We hope this description helps players understand the mature content in the game before purchasing and playing. We are committed to providing a rich and engaging gaming experience while ensuring players are aware of and understand the sensitive content that may be present in the game.
